vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κωσάμ, ὁ
Cosam: Luk.3:28.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.28;
son of: Elmadam (G1678);
father of: Addi (G0078)
§ Cosam, "diviner"
Cosam, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哥桑 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "占卜"
耶穌的祖先之一 (路 3:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哥桑 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "占卜"
耶稣的祖先之一 (路 3:28)
